greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A179071 for p == 1 (mod 4).
comment: It appears that a(n) is negative and even. (Added Aug 28 2011: This conjecture has been proved by Maxim Vsemirnov.)
link: M. Vsemirnov, On R. Chapman's "evil determinant": case p == 1 (mod 4), arXiv preprint arXiv:1108.4031 [math.NT], 2011-2012.
mathematica: a71[p_] := Module[{k}, k = (p-1)/2; Det @ Table[JacobiSymbol[j-i, p], {i, 1, k+1}, {j, 1, k+1}]];
results.author: _Jonathan Sondow_ and _Wadim Zudilin_, Jun 29 2010
